thread.title: 3D Printing Services Market: Global trends and forecast 2015-2019
thread.title_full: 3D Printing Services Market: Global trends and forecast 2015-2019 | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: 3D Printing Services Market: Global trends and forecast 2015-2019
text:
(MENAFN Press) (EMAILWIRE.COM, August 28, 2015 ) Portland, OR -- About 3D Printing Services: 
Over the years, enterprises around the world have become increasingly dependent on various advanced technologies to run their business and drive revenue growth. This trend is expected to intensify, which in turn would increase the importance of adoption of new technologies such as 3D printing. 

3D printing technology is one of the most promising technologies among various industries to produce different prototypes and products. Within a short period, 3D printing technology has influenced many industries to produce various products for its customers with high quality and accuracy. It has the ability to save time, easily build complex structures, enrich the quality, and minimize the cost. It finds application in many industries such as fashion, manufacturing, medical and food. 

Global 3D printing services market to grow at a CAGR of 48.64% during 2014-2019. 

To get details visit @ http://www.bigmarketresearch.com/3d-printing-services-global-trends-and-forecast-2015-2019-market

Covered in this Report:
This report covers the overview of the global 3D printing services market. The report also includes market segmentation by end users and geography.

Global 3D Printing Services Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes profile of key vendors operating in this market.
